long_description: The Prodigy longboard is the new downhill race machine from Arbor! It employs a range of technologies and features to achieve unprecedented performance. This shredstick has a 1/4 in. dropped platform, 5/8 in. of rocker and a mellow W-concave for extra support and leverage. Built with 7 plies of sustainably sourced hard rock maple for lightweight, durable performance. GatorGrip(R) tape couples a long-wearing surface with highly aggressive grit. Freeride 72mm, 78a durometer wheels provide excellent carve, downhill, slide and urban commuting performance; they help manage speed, drifting and high-powered turning. Offset vented hubs provide light, cool performance; a wide contact patch increases traction and a sharp, flexible inner and outer lip allows wheels to conform to the road. Arbor Prodigy includes ABEC 5 bearings and Paris 180mm trucks.
short_description: The Prodigy longboard is the new downhill race machine from Arbor! It employs a range of technologies and features to achieve unprecedented performance.
